H0.text: Precipitation is the process of water changing from its liquid state to a gas in the water cycle.

H1.text: Evaporation is the process of water changing from its liquid state to a gas in the water cycle.

H2.text: Condensation is the process of water changing from its liquid state to a gas in the water cycle.

H3.text: Translation is the process of water changing from its liquid state to a gas in the water cycle.

A4.text: Evaporation is a type of vaporization that occurs on the surface of a liquid as it changes into the gas phase.
